languages.text: {n}Кассия сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Сопровождать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} в странствиях — честь для любого {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g}. Идемте же. Я больше не вынесу мертвенно-бледных теней, что окутывают тела павших".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Сопровождать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} в странствиях — честь для любого {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}. Идемте же. Я больше не вынесу мертвенно-бледных теней, что окутывают тела павших".

languages.text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

languages.text: {n}Cassia nickt dir knapp zu.{/n} "Einen {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} auf seinen Reisen begleiten zu dürfen, ist eine Ehre für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Gehen wir. Ich ertrage den Anblick der totenblassen Schatten nicht mehr, in die die Leichen der Gefallenen gehüllt sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nickt dir knapp zu.{/n} "Einen {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} auf seinen Reisen begleiten zu dürfen, ist eine Ehre für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Gehen wir. Ich ertrage den Anblick der totenblassen Schatten nicht mehr, in die die Leichen der Gefallenen gehüllt sind."

languages.text: {n}Cassia vous adresse un signe de la tête.{/n} « Accompagner {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} est un véritable honneur pour tout {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. Allons-y. La vue des ombres pâles qui enveloppent les corps des morts m'est insupportable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia vous adresse un signe de la tête.{/n} « Accompagner {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} est un véritable honneur pour tout {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. Allons-y. La vue des ombres pâles qui enveloppent les corps des morts m'est insupportable.  »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅朝你简短地点点头。{/n}“对所有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}而言，能陪同{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}一起旅行，都是无上的殊荣。我们走吧，我再也忍受不了那些死者身上如同死亡一样苍白的阴影了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅朝你简短地点点头。{/n}“对所有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}而言，能陪同{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}一起旅行，都是无上的殊荣。我们走吧，我再也忍受不了那些死者身上如同死亡一样苍白的阴影了。”

languages.text: {n}カシアは素っ気なくうなずく。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の旅に同行することは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}にとって名誉なこと。行きましょう、倒れた者を覆う死のような青白い影を見るのはもう耐えられません」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは素っ気なくうなずく。{/n} 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}の旅に同行することは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}にとって名誉なことだ。行こう、倒れた者の体を覆う死のような青白い影を見るのはもう耐えられない」
{n}カシアは素っ気なくうなずく。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の旅に同行することは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}にとって名誉なこと。行きましょう、倒れた者を覆う死のような青白い影を見るのはもう耐えられません」

languages.text: {n}Cassia asiente brevemente.{/n} «Acompañar a un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} en sus viajes es un honor para cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g}. Vamos, no puedo soportar las pálidas sombras que envuelven los cuerpos de los caídos».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia asiente brevemente.{/n} «Acompañar a un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} en sus viajes es un honor para cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g}. Vamos, no puedo soportar las pálidas sombras que envuelven los cuerpos de los caídos».

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a Rogue Trader on their travels is an honour for any Navigator. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

languages.text: {n}Cassia, başıyla kısa ve net bir şekilde onaylıyor.{/n} "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'e{/g} seyahatleri sırasında eşlik etmek, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} için onurdur. Gidelim. Ölmüşlerin bedenlerini sarmalayan solgun gölgeleri görmeye daha fazla katlanamayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia gives you a curt nod.{/n} "Accompanying a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} on their travels is an honour for any {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Let us go, I can no longer bear the sight of the deathly pale shadows that drape the bodies of the fallen. "

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, başıyla kısa ve net bir şekilde onaylıyor.{/n} "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'e seyahatleri sırasında eşlik etmek, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} için onurdur. Gidelim. Ölmüşlerin bedenlerini sarmalayan solgun gölgeleri görmeye daha fazla katlanamayacağım."
